comments.en:
The original site of the driver http://www.xs4all.nl/~pastolk/ is not accessible any more. Probably this driver is not maintained any more. The driver source code is re-hosted here at FSG OpenPrinting. Please use the "Web page:" link to download the driver.

Simple driver for the Lexmark Z42 and Z43, does up to 1200x600 dpi in 4-ink colour (CMYK), 3-ink colour (CMY, using only the colour ink cartridge), or in grayscale (using only the black ink cartridge). The driver is still in an experimental state, bug reports to the author and the Lexmark forum on this site are welcome.

The driver package contains also a tool for changing the cartridges and aligning the print heads.
